Help: Ensure if unloading detention for a mix of grouped and ungrouped consignees are calculated individually and summed up
Suites: pg2
Test
---
!** Test coverage
No.Of Consignee = 3
Consignee 1 and consignee 2 are of same group
Consignee 3 - different group

Unloading detention - sum of (max of consignee 1 and consignee 2 detention) and consignee 3 detention - 3 days + 3 days = 6 days
